voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.calibra.evaluation/MelodyEvaluator

MelodyEvaluator

class MelodyEvaluator

Pure Kotlin melody evaluator.

Ported from native/src/calibra/core/evaluation/MelodyEvaluator.cpp for the "Kotlin-max, C-min" migration.

Evaluates how well a student's singing matches a reference melody using DTW alignment and segment-by-segment scoring.
